snippet.title: Xion Leak - 2nd trailer (demo 2023)
snippet.description:
⚡ Demo available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1948490/Xion_Leak/
Wishlist it now! 

Cooperate as a duo to escape the Xion cloud! 💨🤖🤖 
Flee before the gas fries your precious circuits!

Run fast, be synchronized, and avoid the countless dangers of the factory. Fight enormous bosses, achieve the best times, and make it out alive! The mysterious Foreman will guide you through the factory that he knows like the back of his hand...

An extremely fast-paced cooperative platformer for two players with numerous levels, bosses, and secrets.
